snippet.title: Goliath Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Viva Media and Whalebox Studio is pitting giant monsters versus giant robots in Goliath. Check out the gameplay for the Steam (PC), Mac, and Linux game that will launch in winter 2016 but will make its debut at E3 2015 in this trailer.
Subscribe for daily gaming industry news - http://tinyurl.com/ny4j9k6
Find more daily content on http://shacknews.com
